definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: Wash with cold water. This will prevent shrinking.
sentences.chinese: 用涼水清洗，以免羽絨服縮水。

sentences.english: If the watch is used to time, the Yurong Fu is used to keep warm.
sentences.chinese: 如手錶是用來計時的，羽絨服是用來保暖的。

sentences.english: It was very cold outside, so she went out in a thick down jacket.
sentences.chinese: 外面非常冷，所以她穿了一件厚厚的羽絨服出去了。

sentences.english: In winter, cotton coat or feather cloth will be necessary.
sentences.chinese: 冬季則需穿棉大衣或羽絨服。

sentences.english: This is my new down jacket.
What clothes should you take with you? I should take a down coat, and boots.
sentences.chinese: 你應該帶什麼衣服走？我應該帶羽絨服和靴子。

sentences.english: Do you have this down jacket in different colors?
sentences.chinese: 這件羽絨服有不同的顏色嗎？

sentences.english: This will be Bosideng’s first overseas down apparel and menswear flagship store.
sentences.chinese: 這將是該公司首次於海外開設羽絨服及男裝旗艦店。

sentences.english: I was wearing a down jacket and photographing their classroom.
sentences.chinese: 我穿着羽絨服在教室裏拍攝。

sentences.english: If no vehicle access to transport, the best there is a down jacket cap.
sentences.chinese: 若出入沒車接送，最好是有帽子的羽絨服。

sentences.english: But I was wearing thick goose-down jacket with inner pants.
sentences.chinese: 但是我正穿着厚的羽絨服上衣。

sentences.english: I was just thinking of buying a down-padded anorak.
sentences.chinese: 我正想買一件羽絨服呢。

sentences.english: Tom: I think his sweaters and his down coats are what he most needs at this moment.
sentences.chinese: 我想他的毛衣和羽絨服是這個時刻他最需要的。
